TopicTitle: United Planets of Kerbol Invasion Army!

Articles.Content:
Note: This Challenge will take many of hours of time and trial and error. Do Not Attempt if new to the game that is a sincere warning

CHALLENGE: Amass the Biggest army that you can make on Kerbin that can travel all the way to the Jool System. 

 

Rules: All Stock, no cheats,no more than 10,000 ore may be extracted for mining (Challange 2: all in one go for refills from Kerbin) 

Phase 1: Make a Working army not just for show weapons that actually do damage.

Phase 2: Load them into a Transport of sorts and send them to orbit

Phase 3: Let each transport dock to a mothership to transport it to other celestial bodies

 

Challenge 2:

Phase 1: Leave Kerbin Orbit with army and depart for Laythe

Phase 2: Undock transports from mothership and land them at laythe

Phase 3: Assemble Army on Laythe Shores IN FORMATION!  They must be in square or rectangular units, each unit being a different class (example: rectangle of tanks rectangle of infantry rectangle of Infantry Vehicles. 

Scoring for Challange 2: 

Note Point only Awarded if all Phases are ACCURATLY completed. 

8 Infantry = 1 point 

4 tanks = 2 points

2 Planes = 8 Points

12 Infantry Assault Vehicles = 6 points

1 Standard Ship = 10 Points

1 Submarine = 30 Points

1 Aircraft Carrier = 100 Points

5 Landing Craft Equal = 15 Points

Should you choose to do this Challange Good Luck

 

 

 

 

 

 

Edited December 2, 2017 by Cheif Operations Director
Wait how the crud do you get an army with actual weapons? The way you say this it sounds like you mean kerbals with weapons, and that isn't possible.
